short_summary: EMC Software Maintenance and Support for SSC - DND
description: Shared Services Canada (SSC) has a requirement for the provision of  EMC Software Maintenance and Support for SSC – DND .
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
### Emmc Software Maintenance and Support for SSC - DND

#### Solicitation Information

| **English** | **Français** |
| --- | --- |
| Solicitation Number | Numéro de sollicitation | `BPM018481/22253`  |
| Reference Number | Numéro de référence | `SSC-23-00022253:T` |
| Publication Date | Date de publication | `2023-03-09` |
| Tender Closing Date | Date de clôture des offres | `2023-03-17T14:00:00` |
| Tender Status | Statut de l'offre |Expired (Expiré) |
| Notice Type | Type d'avis | `Request for Proposal` (Demande de propositions) |
| Procurement Category | Catégorie de satisfaction |`Government Division (GD)`|

#### Requirements

* The solicitation contains a security requirement.
* The tender is covered under various trade agreements: 
  * Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) 
  * Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA) 
  * Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP) 
  * Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement 
  * Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) 
  * Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement 
  * Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement 
  * Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement 
  * Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement 
  * Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement 
  * Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement 
  * World Trade Organization - Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-GPA)

#### Submission Information

* Final closing date for proposal submission: `2023-03-17T14:00:00` (Eastern Standard Time)
* Suppliers may inquire or submit emails to: `tenders-offres@ssc-spc.gc.ca`
* Link to P2P Portal to access BPM solicitation: `https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/rfp/request_browse_public`

#### Contact Information

* `Eric Lavigne`
* `tenders-offres@ssc-spc.gc.ca`
* Telefon: `343-541-8756`
* Fax: `613-960-6026`

#### Attachment

The solicitation is available at the following links: 
  * https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc
